amendment.description: Amendments en bloc make technical corrections and provide that regional councils may impose fees on fishing vessels in order to cover the costs of placing observers aboard such fishing vessels; require that if observers are needed in fisheries governed under an individual transferrable quota (ITQ) system fishery, they be present at a level that insures statistically significant enforcement of catch quotas; and require that fish processing vessels in ITQ fisheries carry enough observers to ensure the vessels are monitored 24 hours per day.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, consisting of several amendments offered en bloc, to make technical corrections and minor changes to the bill.

action.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
